title: verify_container_registry_api_functionality
description: Test the container registry API to ensure it supports both IoT-enabled and manual container tracking, allowing creation, update, retrieval, and deletion of container records.

title: validate_real_time_container_health_monitoring
description: Verify the real-time container health monitoring API integrates correctly with Orbcomm API, providing accurate and timely health status updates and alerts.

title: test_ai_alert_detection_and_classification_api
description: Ensure the AI-powered alert detection and classification API correctly identifies and categorizes alerts, triggering appropriate automated resolution workflows.

title: check_client_portal_service_request_management
description: Validate the client portal API for service request management, including creating, updating, viewing service requests, and receiving real-time notifications.

title: verify_technician_management_and_whatsapp_integration
description: Test the technician management API with WhatsApp interactive workflows, including schedule acknowledgment, GPS tracking, and status updates.

title: validate_intelligent_scheduling_engine_api
description: Test the intelligent scheduling engine API to ensure it optimizes daily technician assignments using AI algorithms and handles scheduling conflicts.

title: test_automated_invoicing_and_payment_tracking_api
description: Verify the automated invoicing and payment tracking API integrates with Razorpay/Stripe, supports prepaid and postpaid flows, and sends payment reminders.

title: check_whatsapp_business_api_integration
description: Validate end-to-end WhatsApp Business API integration, including sending and receiving customizable interactive message templates for clients and technicians.

title: test_inventory_management_api_with_real_time_spare_parts_tracking
description: Ensure the inventory management API supports real-time spare parts tracking, reservation, and updates inventory status accurately.

title: validate_admin_dashboard_metrics_and_manual_overrides
description: Test the admin dashboard API for metrics retrieval, real-time monitoring updates, manual overrides, and report generation.
